name: Ghost Treats
description:
In a town full of ghosts, one child must brave the neighborhood on Halloween night to get ten pieces of candy to fill your bag. Things aren't so easy, however, when jerks like the bag-snatchers try to steal children's bags of candy- chasing them as soon as they come close enough to be seen. As this young ghost, you must go between houses, finding homes with lights on that are offering candy while still avoiding the bag-snatchers.

Use WASD to move

Created by:

Miranda Holland

M Donahue

Stephen Shekailo

Alan Ganan
